hackathon-description-text: is a hackathon for high schoolers of all programming abilities. It’s free, all day (12 hours), and equipped with hackable hardware (e.g. Arduino, Raspberry Pi), great prizes, tons of swag, delicious food (all meals provided!), and mentors to help you build your project.
hackathon-rules: See http://lexhack.github.io/conduct.pdf for full details, but in short be a decent person and fair competitor.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: 1st Prize: Amazon Echo Dots + lex.ma $100 credit
3rd Place: Logitech X100 Speakers + Startupvitamins Posters

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Math Building, 251 Waltham St, Lexington, MA 02421, USA
hackathon-location-address: Math Building, 251 Waltham St, Lexington, MA 02421, USA
hackathon-description-header: A local hackathon held at Lexington High School!
